thread.title: A Fukushima 'ice wall' fails to stop toxic water

title: A Fukushima 'ice wall' fails to stop toxic water
text:
A Fukushima 'ice wall' fails to stop toxic water 10:42am GMT - 01:22 
A costly “ice wall” is failing to keep groundwater from seeping into the stricken Fukushima Dai-ichi nuclear plant, data from operator Tokyo Electric Power Co shows, preventing it from removing radioactive melted fuel at the site seven years after the disaster. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
